mazegame

Class MazeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazegame.MazeGame

  • public class MazeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the basic functionality of the maze game. This class is responsible for performing the following operations: 1. At creation, it initializes the instance variables used to store the current state of the game. 2. When a move is specified, it checks if it is a legal move and makes the move if it is legal. 3. It reports information about the current state of the game when asked.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MazeGame(java.lang.String layoutFileName)
      Creates a new MazeGame that corresponds to the maze in the file named layoutFileName.

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        Returns true if the surrounding cells of both Monkeys are not valid spaces to move into. Conditions to check if blocked: 1. Surrounding cells are not Bananas 2. Surrounding cells are not MobileBananas 3. Surrounding cells are not Vacant cells
        Returns:
        True if the surrounding cells of both Monkeys are not valid spaces to move into.
